about_the_game:
ExoHarvest game pioneers land on Earth Experience a unique survival experience, explore the land, farm, find resources. Trade with partners Fight against unknown creatures.


Farming
The reason why there must be farming on other planets is because Earth is constantly lacking resources. The cause was a large human war. causing the loss of almost all of the world's ecosystems Because we came to this planet to farm and gather resources.
detailed_description:
ExoHarvest game pioneers land on Earth Experience a unique survival experience, explore the land, farm, find resources. Trade with partners Fight against unknown creatures.


Farming
The reason why there must be farming on other planets is because Earth is constantly lacking resources. The cause was a large human war. causing the loss of almost all of the world's ecosystems Because we came to this planet to farm and gather resources.
name: ExoHarvest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8.1/Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700k / Ryzen 7 CPU or better
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
